1.SceneDescription: Joey and Rachel’s, Joey is at the counter eating a bowl of Frosted Flakes.

lines.Line: (thinking) All right. It’s a new day. All that stuff about Rachel, you don’t feel that now. It was crazy! You’re fine. You’re better than fine! You are, as your friend Tony would say, Grrrreat! Everything’s normal! She’s just your friend Rachel! Your friend Rachel. Your friend! Rachel

2.SceneDescription: Central Perk, Phoebe and Rachel are sitting on the couch. Ross sits down.

lines.Line:
Hi! Oh, Ross, don’t forget, we have that doctor’s appointment
tomorrow
Hey, are you going to find out the sex of the baby

No-no, we talked about it. We don’t want to know. All we care about is
that it’s happy and healthy
Yep! Happy and healthy! And cute
Yep! Happy and healthy! And cute
Yep! Happy and healthy! And cute

Are you two talking about the same baby? Hey! Have you started off thinking
of names yet
Oh yeah! I’ve come up with a bunch of ideas
Oh yeah! I’ve come up with a bunch of ideas
Uh huh! If it’s a girl, Phoebe, and if it’s a boy, Phoebo

Maybe. But it wouldn’t hurt to have a backup, you know? Uh, Rach-Rach,
what were you thinking? (Gives her a look

Okay! I was thinking if it’s a girl, how about Sandrine? It’s
French

Okay! I was thinking if it’s a girl, how about Sandrine? It’s
French
Huh. That’s a really pretty name for-for an industrial solvent
Okay fine, what do you have
Okay fine, what do you have

Well, OK, it’s for a boy. Well, I know it’s a little out there,
but…Darwin
Wow, oh my God, our child will be beaten to death in the schoolyard
Wow, oh my God, our child will be beaten to death in the schoolyard
You’re just saying that 'cause I said no to your name
How-how about you each get five vetoes

Yeah! I don’t think you’re going to need it though. Okay, check
this out. If it’s a girl, Rain

Rain? Hi. Hi, my name is Rain. I have my own kiln, and my dress is made out
of wheat
I know her! I bought homemade soap from her at a Dead show
Okay, how about, for a guy, Thatcher
Okay, how about, for a guy, Thatcher
Okay, how about, for a guy, Thatcher
Ross, why do you hate our child
But only if it’s a girl
But only if it’s a girl
Oh, veto. How about—Ooh, I like Ruth! What about Ruth
Oh! I’m sorry! Are we having an 89-year-old? How about Dayton
Is it me, or is veto starting to sound really good

3.SceneDescription:
The Doctor’s Office, the doctor is writing something as Rachel is on the
table, and Ross is standing.

lines.Line:
I don’t think you had an open mind about the name Ruth. I mean, come on,
little Ruthie Geller, how-how cute is that
Oh, oh my God! I can practically hear the mahjong tiles

Okay! All your tests look fine. Now, are you two interested in knowing
the sex of the baby

But you have it right there in that file? You could tell us whether
it’s a boy or a girl? Dayton or Sandrine? Phoebe or Phoebo
That’s right. But if you don’t want to know
That’s right. But if you don’t want to know
No, no, we want to wait, right
No, no, we want to wait, right

(looks at her beeping pager) Oh, I’ll be right back. And, uh, I know
it’s really not my place, but please don’t name your child Phoebo

(looking at the bulletin board with baby pictures) So, which of these
babies do you think is the ugliest

What? Rach! Come on, that’s terrible!
They’re…uh…they’re babies. They’re-they’re all beautiful

Yeah, why is it staring at me? I think it knows I’m talking about it.
(Rachel starts to peek at the file) Don’t-don’t you—Wh—Wha—Hey!!
Okay fine, I did. But I didn’t see anything, I swear
Shame on you! Ugly baby judges you
Shame on you! Ugly baby judges you
Okay, but Ross just listen to me
Okay, but Ross just listen to me
No, no, no, no! Don’t tell me! I don’t want to know

But I couldn’t even if I wanted to, because I don’t know! I
swear; I didn’t see anything, and I don’t want to know! It was just a momentary
lapse
Momentary lapse. Don’t-don’t you have any self-control
Momentary lapse. Don’t-don’t you have any self-control
(holding stomach) Okay, a couple months late on the lecture, Ross

4.SceneDescription: Central perk, Ross is sitting on the chair as Rachel walks in.

lines.Line:
You know what? I’ve been thinking about it. I’m really coming
around on the name Ruth. I think I would actually consider naming our child that

Rach, I-I can’t tell you how-how much that means to me! Ohh… Wait a
minute. Wait a minute. You-you hated the name Ruth! Why-why would you change your mind?
Unless, you know we’re never going to have to use it. You did see the folder. You
know it’s a boy
I didn’t see anything! I actually changed my mind about the name
I didn’t see anything! I actually changed my mind about the name

I don’t think so! You’re just giving me Ruth so you’ll get to
name it when it’s a boy, and that’s when you’ll swoop in and name him Heath
or Blaine or Sequoia

Unless… (Rachel groans.) You anticipated that I would figure all
this out and you know that it actually is a girl, and you really do want her to be named
Ruth! Well, I’m not falling for that! Okay? Ruth is off the table
But Ross, you want the name Ruth
But Ross, you want the name Ruth

5.SceneDescription: Central Perk, Rachel is on the couch as Ross enters.

lines.Line: So, I uh… I called the doctor and now we both know the sex of the baby
That’s right. The student has become the master
Ross, I swear, I don’t know
Ross, I swear, I don’t know
Oh, come on, you know it’s a girl
Oh, come on, you know it’s a girl
Yes. I’m… I’m sorry. I’m so sorry

I’m not! We’re having a girl! Sometimes I can’t believe
it’s with you—But still! We’re having a girl
I know! I know. You know what? I’m putting Ruth back on the table
I know! I know. You know what? I’m putting Ruth back on the table
Oh, yes! We’ll have ourselves a little baby Ruth

6.SceneDescription: Joey and Rachel’s, Joey is sitting at the counter eating Cocoa Puffs.

lines.Line: (thinking) All right. It’s a new day, and it’s just a crush, that’s all! Just a little crush! All that worrying I was doing, that was crazy. Crazy! Like my friend here the bird would say, "it was cuckoo!" Everything’s going to be fine. It’s just a crush.
